var input = inputs.input; var inputType = inputs.inputType; var showOccurrences = inputs.showOccurrences; var flows = []; var subflows = []; var hasDeletedItems = false; var flowLabel = input; if (inputType == "sys_id") { if (kind == "Subflow") { var snapshotIDs = []; var flowSnapshotGR = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_flow_snapshot'); flowSnapshotGR.addQuery('parent_flow.sys_id', input); flowSnapshotGR.query(); while (flowSnapshotGR.next()) { var sysID = flowSnapshotGR.sys_id.toString(); if (!arrayContains(snapshotIDs, sysID)) { snapshotIDs.push(sysID); if (flowLabel == input) { flowLabel = flowSnapshotGR.parent_flow.name; } } } } else { var actionGR = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_action_type_definition'); actionGR.get(input); flowLabel = actionGR.name; } } var output = "<b><i>" + kind + " '" + flowLabel + "' is used in following</i></b><br><br>"; if (kind == "Subflow") { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_sub_flow_instance'); if (inputType == "sys_id") { gr.addQuery('subflow.sys_id', 'IN', snapshotIDs); } else { gr.addQuery('subflow.name', input); } } else { var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_action_instance'); gr.addQuery('action_type_parent.' + inputType, input); } gr.orderBy("flow.name"); if (showOccurrences) { var occurrences = {}; gr.orderBy("order"); } gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { var flow = gr.flow.name; var flowType = gr.flow.type; if (showOccurrences) { mapOccurrences(flow, parseInt(gr.order)); } if (flowType == "flow") { if (!arrayContains(flows, flow)) { flows.push(flow); } } else if (flowType == "subflow") { if (!arrayContains(subflows, flow)) { subflows.push(flow); } } } output += "<b>Flows(" + flows.length + ") :</b><br><br>"; printArray("flow-designer", flows); output += "<br><b>Subflows(" + subflows.length + ") :</b><br><br>"; printArray("sub-flow-designer", subflows); if (hasDeletedItems) { output += "<br>* - Deleted Item. Not Accessible via Flow Designer"; } outputs.output = '<div style="font-family:consolas !important; padding: 5px 16px 5px 8px;">' + output.trim() + '</div>'; function arrayContains(array, obj) { for (var i = 0; i < array.length; i++) { if (array[i] == obj) { return true; } } return false; } function getFlowDetails(flowID) { var stats = { visible: false, active: false }; var flowGR = new GlideRecord('sys_hub_flow'); flowGR.addQuery('name', flowID); flowGR.query(); if (flowGR.next()) { stats.sys_id = flowGR.getValue("sys_id"); stats.visible = true; stats.active = flowGR.active; } return stats; } function printArray(fdType, array) { var url = "/$flow-designer.do?sysparm_nostack=true&sysparm_use_polaris=false#/" + fdType + "/"; for (i in array) { var flow = array[i]; var flowDetails = getFlowDetails(flow); if (flowDetails.visible) { output += '<a href="' + url + flowDetails.sys_id + '">' + flow + '</a>'; } else { output += flow; } if (flowDetails.active) { } else { output += " [Inactive]"; } if (!flowDetails.visible) { hasDeletedItems = true; output += "*"; } if (showOccurrences) { printOccurrences(flow); } output += "<br>"; } } function printOccurrences(flowName) { var arr = occurrences[flowName]; arr.sort(function (a, b) { return a - b; }); output += "<br> └─ Used at : " + arr; } function mapOccurrences(flowName, occurrence) { var arr = occurrences[flowName]; if (arr) { if (!arrayContains(arr, occurrence)) { arr.push(occurrence); } } else { occurrences[flowName] = [occurrence]; } } })(inputs, outputs);71aa7f6647032200b4fad7527c9a719binputc3f389d21b607d144278dbd1f54bcb23LNAVARATHNE2023-08-11 09:31:189bf389d21b607d144278dbd1f54bcbcd1LNAVARATHNE2023-08-14 07:01:25var__m_sys_hub_step_ext_input_c3f389d21b607d144278dbd1f54bcb23

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TextTable</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>A simple class to print-out sets of texts as an organized table.</description><name>TextTable</name><script><![CDATA[/****************************************************************************************
* Author       : Lakshan Navarathne
* Description  : A simple class to print-out sets of texts as an organized table.

API Usage:

|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|          TextTable Method          | Description                                           |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|          headers(args...)          | Sets specified argument(s) as the headers of the      |
|                                    | table. (Optional)                                     |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|        headersFromArray([])        | Same as headers() but takes an Array input.           |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|            add(args...)            | Adds the specified argument(s) as a new row to the    |
|                                    | table.                                                |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|          addFromArray([])          | Same as add() but takes an Array input.               |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|             getTable()             | Returns the table output as String.                   |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|              print()               | Prints the table. Similar to gs.print(tt.getTable())  |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|      seperateRows(true|false)      | Sets how the rows are seperated.                      |
|                                    |                                                       |
|                                    |  • null  - Seperates only if there are cells with     |
|                                    |            multiline text. (Default)                  |
|                                    |  • true  - Always seperate rows.                      |
|                                    |  • false - Never seperate rows.                       |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|      getValueAt(column, row)       | Gets or sets the value of the specified cell. Cell    |
|                                    | (0, 0) represents the first cell (without headers).   |
|   setValueAt(column, row, value)   |                                                       |
|                                    |  • column - Index of the column.                      |
|                                    |  • row    - Index of the row.                         |
|                                    |  • value  - Value to be set. Can be of any type.      |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|       alignTable(alignment)        | Sets the specified alignment for all columns.         |
|                                    |                                                       |
|                                    |  • TextTable.ALIGN_LEFT   | 'left'   - Aligns left.   |
|                                    |  • TextTable.ALIGN_RIGHT  | 'right'  - Aligns right.  |
|                                    |  • TextTable.ALIGN_CENTER | 'center' - Aligns center. |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|   alignColumn(column, alignment)   | Sets the specified alignment for the specified        |
|                                    | column(s). Overrrides the alignment specified via     |
| alignColumns(columns[], alignment) | alignTable(). By default, numeric columns are aligned |
|                                    | right; unless specified otherwise.                    |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|    setMaxColumnWidth(maxWidth)     | Sets a max width (character length) for all columns.  |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|
|   limitColumn(column, maxWidth)    | Sets a max width for the specified column(s). This    |
|                                    | overrrides setMaxColumnWidth(). Useful when you have  |
| limitColumns(columns[], maxWidth)  | columns containing long text.                         |
|————————————————————————————————————|———————————————————————————————————————————————————————|

/***************************************************************************************/

var TextTable = Class.create();

TextTable.ALIGN_LEFT = "left";
TextTable.ALIGN_RIGHT = "right";
TextTable.ALIGN_CENTER = "center";

TextTable.prototype = {

	initialize: function () {
		this._tb = [];
		this._columnCount = null;
		this._isHeaderSet = false;
		this._rowSeperate = null;
		this._defaultMaxColumnWidth = null;
		this._columnWidthLimits = {};
		this._columnAlignments = {};
		this._tableAlignment = null;
		this._h_char = "—";
		this._v_char = "|";
	},

	headers: function () {
		if (this._tb[0]) {
			this._tb.splice(0, 0, arguments);
		} else {
			this._tb.push(arguments);
		}
		this._adjustColumnCount(arguments);
		this._isHeaderSet = true;
		return this;
	},

	headersFromArray: function (headersArray) {
		if (!Array.isArray(headersArray)) {
			throw new Error('Invalid TextTable.headersFromArray() arguments.');
		}
		var o = {};
		for (var i in headersArray) {
			o[i] = headersArray[i];
		}
		if (this._tb[0]) {
			this._tb.splice(0, 0, o);
		} else {
			this._tb.push(o);
		}
		this._adjustColumnCount(o);
		this._isHeaderSet = true;
		return this;
	},

	add: function () {
		this._tb.push(arguments);
		this._adjustColumnCount(arguments);
		return this;
	},

	addFromArray: function (values) {
		if (!Array.isArray(values)) {
			throw new Error('Invalid TextTable.addFromArray() arguments.');
		}
		var o = {};
		for (var i in values) {
			o[i] = values[i];
		}
		this._tb.push(o);
		this._adjustColumnCount(o);
		return this;
	},

	_getTableAsText: function (output) {
		var resp = this._processData();
		var tt = resp.tt;
		var lineHeights = resp.lineHeights;
		var columnWidths = resp.columnWidths;
		var row_seperator = this._getSeperator(columnWidths);
		output += row_seperator;
		var showRowSeperator = (this._rowSeperate == true) || (this._rowSeperate == null && resp.autoRowSeperate);
		for (var r = 0; r < Object.keys(tt).length; r++) {
			var height = lineHeights[r];
			var row = tt[r];
			for (var h = 0; h < height; h++) {
				output += this._v_char;
				for (var c = 0; c < this._columnCount; c++) {
					var val = row[c];
					var lines = val.split("\n");
					if (lines[h]) {
						output += " " + lines[h] + " " + this._v_char;
					} else {
						output += " ".repeat(columnWidths[c] + 2) + this._v_char;
					}
				}
				output += "\n";
			}
			if (showRowSeperator || (r == 0 && this._isHeaderSet) || r == Object.keys(tt).length - 1) {
				output += row_seperator;
			}
		}
		return output;
	},

	_getSeperator: function (columnWidths) {
		var s = this._v_char;
		for (c = 0; c < this._columnCount; c++) {
			s += this._h_char.repeat(columnWidths[c] + 2) + this._v_char;
		}
		s += "\n";
		return s;
	},

	getTable: function () {
		return this._getTableAsText("");
	},

	print: function () {
		gs.print(this._getTableAsText("\n"));
	},

	getValueAt: function (column, row) {
		if (this._isHeaderSet) {
			row++;
		}
		return this._tb[row][column];
	},

	setValueAt: function (column, row, value) {
		if (typeof column !== 'number' || typeof row !== 'number' || column < 0 || row < 0) {
			throw new Error('Invalid TextTable.setValueAt() arguments.');
		}
		var col_no = column + 1;
		if (this._columnCount < col_no) {
			this._columnCount = col_no;
		}
		if (this._isHeaderSet) {
			row++;
		}
		this._tb[row][column] = value;
	},

	seperateRows: function (seperate) {
		this._rowSeperate = seperate;
		return this;
	},

	setMaxColumnWidth: function (maxWidth) {
		if (typeof maxWidth !== 'number' || maxWidth < 1) {
			throw new Error('Invalid TextTable.setMaxColumnWidth() arguments.');
		}
		this._defaultMaxColumnWidth = maxWidth;
		return this;
	},

	limitColumn: function (column, maxWidth) {
		if (typeof column !== 'number' || column < 0 || typeof maxWidth !== 'number' || maxWidth < 1) {
			throw new Error('Invalid TextTable.limitColumn() arguments.');
		}
		this._columnWidthLimits[column] = maxWidth;
		return this;
	},

	limitColumns: function (columns, maxWidth) {
		if (!Array.isArray(columns) || typeof maxWidth !== 'number' || maxWidth < 1) {
			throw new Error('Invalid TextTable.limitColumns() arguments.');
		}
		for (i in columns) {
			var column = columns[i];
			if (typeof column !== 'number' || column < 0) {
				throw new Error('Invalid TextTable.limitColumns() arguments.');
